thread.title: Travel update: no service between York and Newcastle | Tyne Tees
thread.title_full: Travel update: no service between York and Newcastle | Tyne Tees - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Travel update: no service between York and Newcastle | Tyne Tees
text:
Major disruption on CrossCountry at Darlington due to signalling problem. Trains cannot run between York and Newcastle via Darlington. Some trains are being diverted via Sunderland with journeys times extended by up to 90 minutes. A very limited road replacement transport service is available between York and Newcastle.
Last updated Fri 4 Sep 2015 Travel York Newcastle Darlington Sunderland North Yorkshire County Durham Gateshead Durham Northumberland Teesside Tyne and Wear Middlesbrough
